content.rendered:
• Baggage weighing more than 23kg but not above 32kg is charged.
  • Rates for Weight Concept:Baggage in excess of the checked baggage allowance charges apply at 1.5% per kg of the highest Air Namibia normal direct adult one way economy class fare.
Country 1st piece at no more than 23kg 2nd piece at no more than 23kg weight more then 23kg
(never more then 32kg)		 Any Additional Piece
(up to 32kg pp)
To / From Frankfurt ( FRA ) FREE USD 200 USD 150 USD 200
Regional ( WDH, JNB, CPT, LAD, GBE, VFA, DUR, LUN, HRE ) FREE FREE USD 90 USD 110
Domestic (within Namibia) FREE USD 100 USD 50 USD 100

For more details visit : https://www.Air Namibia .com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Namibia Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Namibia Checked Baggage

excerpt.rendered: Baggage weighing more than 23kg but not above 32kg is charged. Rates for Weight Concept:Baggage in excess of the checked baggage allowance charges apply at 1.5% per kg of the highest Air Namibia normal direct adult one way economy class fare. Country 1st piece at no more than 23kg 2nd piece at no more than 23kg […]
